FuncDef:
The host-packet fast-send enable command enables fast reply of host packets.
The undo host-packet fast-send enable command disables fast reply of host packets.
By default, fast reply of host packets is disabled.
CLIs: host-packet fast-send { tcp | udp | rawip } enable
undo host-packet fast-send { tcp | udp | rawip } enable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A device proactively sends a large number of host packets during interface route switching. To relieve the CPU usage of the host module, run the host-packet fast-send enable command to enable fast reply of host packets based on the service type configured on the interface.
